name: Fielder's ChoiceVR Baseball and Softball Fielding Training
summary: Training to become an elite baseball/softball player is a tedious task that involves a great deal of repetitive training.  Imagine having the ability to train when you want, where you want and how you want.  Lifelike repetitive ground balls and pop ups tailored specifically to your needs without ever leaving your room.  Well you don't have to imagine any longer, Fielder's ChoiceVR is your solution.
